snippet.title: Mazes of Karradash 2 - Ninja Gameplay
snippet.description:
"Mazes of Karradash 2" is an upcoming Dungeon Crawl for iOS and Android.

In this video, you can see the exploration of Level 2 using a Ninja,  one of the 10 classes available the game.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/68kstudios/
Website: http://www.68kstudios.com
